comment: Mayank is a highly skilled professional, the kind of work and enthusiasm he has shown in different tasks are evident of his proficiency in different IT skills. And this makes him a team worker, that can add value to the work so that the teams will get new heights and get desired results in no time. I firmly believe that he will be a great asset to your organization.

An enthusiastic employee with proactiveness and good initiator for newer things. He is always ready to adapt new technologies. He always tries to minimize your redundant work in easy way by doing something out of the box. He has that spark in which always makes him different from others. I can recommend him for all the future jobs.

I picked up a lot from him when we were working together. He is always prepared, regardless of the technology we are working on.
